Commiseration.Elite 1: When triggering Shatter, the next battle skill Onomatopoeia cast returns 7.5 SP. This effect cannot stack.
Commiseration.Elite 2: When triggering Shatter, the next battle skill Onomatopoeia cast returns 15 SP. This effect cannot stack.

Laziness Pays Off Now.Elite 2: Ignores Cryo Infliction and receives Cryo DMG -10%.
Laziness Pays Off Now.Elite 3: Ignores Cryo Infliction and receives Cryo DMG -20%.

Fragmented Rest.Elite 1: Assign to Control Nexus to grant all operators' Mood Regen +8%
Fragmented Rest.Elite 3: Assign to Control Nexus to grant all operators' Mood Regen +12%

Frequency Monitoring.Elite 2: Assign to Reception Room to grant operator clue collecting efficiency +20%
Frequency Monitoring.Elite 4: Assign to Reception Room to grant operator clue collecting efficiency +30%
